name: DuckDuckGo 'Dark' Tile Fix
description: Makes the 'tiles' on DuckDuckGo's 'dark' theme not stand out like a sore thumb anymore.
additional_info: Changes: 4/11/14 - Fixed active/inactive tiles (When filtering by type) 4/11/14 - Fixed colors for product tiles. 4/11/14 - Removed white background color on images for the instant answers.
